scripts.dev:react: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix express-api" "npm run start --prefix react-app"
scripts.dev:ember: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix express-api" "npm run start --prefix ember-app"
scripts.dev:svelte: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix express-api" "npm run dev --prefix ember-app"
scripts.dev:vue: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix express-api" "npm run dev --prefix vue-app"
scripts.postinstall: concurrently "npm i --prefix express-api" "npm i --prefix react-app" "npm i --prefix ember-app" "npm i --prefix svelte-app" "npm i --prefix vue-app"
